ai-thag5.1:1.1_0: I, a monk, went to a charnel ground
ai-thag5.1:1.2_0: and saw a woman’s body abandoned there,
ai-thag5.1:2.1_0: in disgust of sin they detest,
ai-thag5.1:2.3_0: but sexual desire arose in me,
ai-thag5.1:2.4_0: I was as if blind to her oozing body.
ai-thag5.1:3.1_0: Quicker than the cooking of rice
ai-thag5.1:3.4_0: I retired to a discreet place.
ai-thag5.1:5.2_0: see the excellence of the teaching!”
